name: Cozy Fears
description:
Venture out of your warm, cozy living room to explore the rest of your house. With your parents gone for the night, who knows what might happen?

This game was made in 48 hours for the WinterMelon Game Jam 2022. Bigger ideas and a cohesive story were planned, but they had to be scrapped for the sake of time. We hope you enjoy the game regardless!
